implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Interface for JavaFX controllers.

      • setResources

      • getLocaleStr

        protected java.lang.String getLocaleStr(java.lang.String key)

      • init

        public abstract void init()
        Initializes controller's components. This method is activated when SceneLoader.loadAllFromDirectory(String) loads scene, this thing is like constructor or JavaFX's native initialize.

      • run

        public abstract void run()
        This method is called after Main.changeScene(String, String) have been used. Runs controller.

      • reset

        public abstract void reset()
        This method is called after Main.changeScene(String, String) have been used. Is used to reset controller's old data.

        public FXController clone()

        clone in class java.lang.Object
